title: Canyon De Chelly National Monument: News
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     News             News        Kindergarten students from the local Chinle Elementary School learn to plant in the demonstration garden near the Visitor Center.  Students and their families will be able to water and care for the plants all summer.  The students will then harvest the fruits and vegetables to share with their families.        NEWS IN THE NATIONAL PARKS For general information about the park, please visit our Facebook page where photos, happeningss and upcoming events are shared.  There are no current news releases for Canyon de Chelly National Monument. Please visit the National Park Service news page to learn about what's happening in national parks across the country. NEWS ON THE NAVAJO NATION Interested in the latest news on the Navajo Nation? Check out the Navajo Times newspage online.
